languages.text: {n}Уголки губ Соломона ползут вверх.{/n} "Провести ночь со страстным партнером, выплеснуть напряжение, дать крови утихнуть. А после смыть кровь врагов и пот горячей водой".

{n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."
languages.original_text: {n}Уголки губ Соломона ползут вверх.{/n} "Провести ночь со страстным партнером, выплеснуть напряжение, дать крови утихнуть. А после смыть кровь врагов и пот горячей водой".

languages.text: {n}Un léger sourire se dessine au coin des lèvres de Solomorne.{/n} « Je veux passer la nuit avec {mf|un partenaire passionné|une partenaire passionnée} pour me défouler et dissiper l'ardeur de la bataille. Ensuite, un bon bain chaud sera nécessaire pour laver ma sueur et le sang de mes ennemis. »
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un léger sourire se dessine au coin des lèvres de Solomorne.{/n} « Je veux passer la nuit avec {mf|un partenaire passionné|une partenaire passionnée} pour me défouler et dissiper l'ardeur de la bataille. Ensuite, un bon bain chaud sera nécessaire pour laver ma sueur et le sang de mes ennemis. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかに吊り上がった。{/n}「情熱的な相手と夜を過ごして、鬱憤を晴らし、たぎった血を少し冷ましたいと思っています。そのあとで、熱い湯で汗と敵の血を洗い流したいんです」
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかに吊り上がった。{/n}「情熱的な相手と夜を過ごして、鬱憤を晴らし、たぎった血を少し冷ましたいと思っています。そのあとで、熱い湯で汗と敵の血を洗い流したいんです」

languages.text: {n}Las comisuras de la boca de Solomorne se elevan ligeramente.{/n} «Quiero pasar la noche con una pareja apasionada, desahogarme y dar tiempo a que se me enfríen los ánimos. Y después quiero lavarme el sudor y la sangre de mis enemigos con agua caliente».
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las comisuras de la boca de Solomorne se elevan ligeramente.{/n} «Quiero pasar la noche con una pareja apasionada, desahogarme y dar tiempo a que se me enfríen los ánimos. Y después quiero lavarme el sudor y la sangre de mis enemigos con agua caliente».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的嘴角微微上扬。{/n}“我希望能与充满激情的伴侣共度良宵，释放压力，让我沸腾的热血冷静下来。在这之后，我希望能用热水洗掉身上的汗水与敌人的血迹。”
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的嘴角微微上扬。{/n}“我希望能与充满激情的伴侣共度良宵，释放压力，让我沸腾的热血冷静下来。在这之后，我希望能用热水洗掉身上的汗水与敌人的血迹。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un dudaklarında hınzır bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Geceyi ateşli biriyle geçirip stres atmak, kanımın hararetini almak istiyorum. Sonrasında sıcak bir banyoyla terli bedenimi düşmanın kanından arındıracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un dudaklarında hınzır bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Geceyi ateşli biriyle geçirip stres atmak, kanımın hararetini almak istiyorum. Sonrasında sıcak bir banyoyla terli bedenimi düşmanın kanından arındıracağım."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Mundwinkel zucken unmerklich.{/n} "Ich möchte die Nacht mit einem leidenschaftlichen Partner verbringen, um Dampf abzulassen und mein Blut abzukühlen. Danach will ich mir den Schweiß und das Blut meiner Feinde mit heißem Wasser abwaschen."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's lips twitch upward.{/n} "I want to spend the night with a passionate partner, to let off steam, and to give my blood a chance to cool. Afterward, I want to wash off the sweat and my enemies' gore with hot water."
